document_data.name: Peaceon
document_data.mainbody: '''Peaceon''' was one of the twelve moons of [[Garden]] in [[Realmspace]].
document_data.Description:
Peaceon was a tiny planar object {{SI|17|mi|k|long=yes}} long and only {{SI|1|mi|k|long=yes}} wide.

The moon contained a solitary building in perfect condition.
document_data.History: At one time, Peaceon served as an outpost for [[wildspace]] [[elves]]. It is not known why they abandoned it.
